title: Titipo Titipo
overview: Train Production Plant's new born little train TITIPO has just passed the driving examination and is prepared to work at Choo Choo Town. Although TITIPO dreams of becoming the best train in the world, his curious yet random personality catches him in unforeseen events and troubles everyday. TITIPO expands his experience in the greater world and befriends GENIE, DIESEL, and other little trains. Will TITIPO achieve his dream of becoming the best train? Come join the railroad journey and meet TITIPO and the little train friends.Â
